replies.body: This is epic. More bubbles please =D
This is so cool!!! I want bubbles for the whole website now!!!

Hey, some sort of formatting is already embedded in boards. We've got a thread on it on EU here: http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/off-topic-en/rL385u11-how-to-boards-formatting

Sadly, colors aren't available for users, but there are a few stuff that would make a wall'o'text look better than just... well... a wall. :)
If only I had that kind of power, I would do that for sure!
Instead of putting on some lame event that appears to have no meaning at all, how about doing something about the bots.

Just want to clarify here, apart from giving us the prizes for the competitions, **Riot had nothing to do with this**. It was all designed and planned by Volunteers as our own addition to the official Ocean Week event.

Also the team that does events at Riot is completely separate from the bot/script detection team. That means that when Riot makes an event, it doesn't limit resources for the bot/script detection team because they're entirely separate teams.

It's pretty cool that the volunteers are running this, kind of makes me want to join the volunteer team a little.


I also hope that there's more competition in the fanfic writing area, winning by default is nowhere near as good, and I really want to see what people come up with!
I can give you something that will probably be incoherent to go against if you like :P

> [{quoted}](name=Valor Carrys,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=U5Bjv4Tz,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-01-26T03:53:33.431+0000)
>
> I can give you something that will probably be incoherent to go against if you like :P

Incoherent as in, you're not going to be good at it?

Come on, that's no spirit. I believe in you! Now get out there, and KICK MY A**!

Eh it's more i've never been good at writing "short" stories.

Let alone stories in general, but that is something else entirely.

Greetings from the EU Volunteer Program

This is sooooo very fitting!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H6SXi4I47Qw

Enjoy your Ocean Week!

Ohh good music taste!

You can thank SephirothSG for the great bubbles BTW :)
